title: 'It is the Prime Time for Global Tech Start-ups to Invest in India' Says Viral Jani - Analytics Insight
content: 'It is the Prime Time for Global Tech Start-ups to Invest in India' Says Viral Jani  Analytics Insight
description: In our latest podcast series, Satavisa Pati, Content Analyst at Analytics Insight, talks to Viral Jani EVP and India Country Head, Times Bridge
